import './CalculatorBox.css' import '../css/App.css' import { useState, useRef } from 'react' const CalculatorBox = () => { const [myNumber, setMyNumber] = useState(0) const changeNumber = (e) => { let newNumber = null; switch (e.target.value){ case '+': break; case '-': break; case 'X': break; case '%': break; case '=': break; default: newNumber = parseInt(e.target.value) break; } if (newNumber != null){ setMyNumber((prevState) => prevState * 10 + newNumber); console.log(myNumber); } } return (
); } export default CalculatorBox;
